Name: Sort Me
description: A tool to help developers automatically reorganise their project folders and update import/include statements across multiple languages. Intended to reduce manual folder restructuring work and keep dependencies consistent when module locations change. It parses your codebase, detects directory/movement changes and fixes hard-coded paths or import lines accordingly.

Name: Intergrate Me
description: An integrated development environment (IDE) project designed for multi-platform usage (Windows, Linux and Android). The goal is to provide a unified interface for coding, building and debugging across different operating systems, with streamlined workflows, extensible plugins, version control integration and cross-platform consistency.

Name: OffLee
description: A fully offline learning/challenge application aiming to replicate the experience of coding challenge platforms but without an internet requirement. Users can practice algorithmic problems, see test cases, submit locally and feedback is given instantly. Good for environments with limited connectivity or for practicing without online distractions.
